project.name: MevenIDE IDEA Main Module
project.description: This module is basically an extraction of non-maven related code in the plugin. This separation from the core module (see the Model module) is required due to class loading issues (specifically JDOM versions - IntelliJ uses 0.8, where MevenIDE requires 1.0). Therefor, all mevenide-related code was moved to the mevenide-idea-model module.
project.shortDescription: Main module for the Mevenide IDEA plugin.
